short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple easy to use minimalistic to-do list extension for Chrome

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The to-do list extension is a simple yet powerful tool that allows you to keep track of your tasks while browsing the web. With this extension, you can quickly add new tasks, mark completed tasks, and delete tasks that are no longer relevant. The extension is easy to use and can help you stay organized and productive throughout the day. Whether you're a student, professional, or simply looking to manage your time more efficiently, the to-do list extension is the perfect solution for your needs.
